comments.commentBody:
I personally think that boxing and kickboxing are vile and it wouldn't matter to me if the child was a boy or a girl; I think it is not right to put your child in it. I was curious on the Today segment about the other little girl's backstory.

My kids are not athletes so we always belonged to the non-competitive league. When one of my sons turned 9, his soccer coach invited him to join the travel team. My son said: "Does that mean I actually have to come to practice?"" and when told yes, declined. This same kid had a basketball coach who scheduled the playing time meticulously so that each kid got an equal playing time. The best player in the league was on that team (not my kid!) and even he had to follow the schedule. The funny thing was that the kids were all so proud to be playing that they never missed a practice, practiced on their own and were so happy and connected that they won the championship.

Does anyone besides me understand why Brooks and Hinton resigned? They were guilty of CRIMINAL TRESPASS and hope that by resigning no one will dig any further to find the other times when they did likewise. If they were innocent, would they have so easily given up their high buck positions??? Another person who needs to be charged is Murdoch. Do you honestly think he did not know what his big dog employees were up to??? Give me a break. Geesh.  I see at least 3 people who need to be arrested.

Ah,yes, like Enron, like Goldman Sachs, like AIG, like Geithner et alia, the finest fruit of modern finance capitalism falls once more.  No doubt Murdoch should declare bankruptcy and get bailed out--too big to fail.

Good riddance! What on earth is the Chief of Dow Jones / The Wall Street Journal doing getting promoted that job after overseeing a tabloid hacking operation? Who put him in that position, and WHY?

News Corp. has a LOT to answer to!!!!!!

I am shocked that Murdoch apologized. He must know that there is more.
FOX socalled news? UNFAIR news and many UNBALANCED Storytellers ..

Thanks for solving everyone.  I enjoyed reading about your individual experiences ... particularly when you mention some of your guesses.  My favorite of the day was @30 ... GENERALULYSSESS for [Government grant?}.  Priceless!
Hans #184: what I got so far from figure 8 of the paper is that surface Gamma2, to have constant curvature has to be a slice of sphere (thanks to your post #161).
smush?

I met my wife on a transatlantic crossing in 1960 and we've been married for 47 years.  Short lived romances my foot.  Other than that clue lapse, this puzzle was great.  Once I realized that the famous relief worker was not Speedy Alka Seltzer, and that the statue at the Vatican wasn't a pope, things went well.  Many thanks to PB for another great test.

Halleleuia....Susan, your help got me to the end. I could not have done it without your clues! I did not want to give up, because I have been working on cryptics in one of Piscop's books on and off since last summer. They are scary, but when you finally understand the clues, it is an upper.

The last diagramless was also very challenging, but with help from the blog, I finished it. I think Jerrold took a pass on it. Jerrold, where are you this week? I thought cryptics were your favorites.

I respect William Rhoden as a writer and read his work regularly. Sadly, having done so for some time now, I have started to wonder if there is any African-American athlete that he won't apologize for. I just can't see much in Harrison's work that deserves to be glorified.

Michael Cornelius

www.onsportsandlife.com

comments.userDisplayName: The Artist Formerly Known As Bakes
comments.userLocation: In the castle of my skin
comments.commentBody:
"Questionable illegal hits"?? Are you kidding? I a great deal of respect for William C. Rhoden, but this opinion piece is pure nonsense. I agree with the gist that it's refreshing that an athlete would speak his mind, but in the same breath I'm reminded of the adage "better to remain silent and have the world think you a fool, than to open your mouth and remove all doubt."

Harris should hardly be commended for his repeated pattern of mouthing foolish thoughts. Some things are better off left unsaid.

As a 31 year old mother of an 8th month old, I think both sides are missing a piece of the puzzle. Both sides are nitpicking around the issue.

Motherhood is fetishized in a way that it wasn't 30 years ago. Part of the feminist revolution was the rejection of the motherhood pedestal. Motherhood was not supposed to define you. It's easy for my generation to forget that impulse was fought against, and very strongly. It wasn't purely just to get us out into the workforce. The issue here of sex is just a symptom.

Women have long been criticized for no longer being sexual beings after having a kid. Even Victorian literature and magazines warned women to work at being alluring for their husbands after having a kid.

I'm probably a bit more old fashioned in some of my views regarding feminism. I think it stems from my profession (engineering) as I'm still fighting that fight.

Hinson and Brooks too little too late. Dowlers can't be bought off and neither will 9/11 families if that horror turns out to be true. Murdoch is Citizen Kane come to life now and all are jumping as fast as they can off the rat ship. Can you say "rosebud?"

Who would have imagined that Orson Welles' masterpiece would be a Hearst and a Murdoch story? Incredibly prescient. Welcome to irrelevance, Mr. M.

It may be turn out that the reason to vote for Obama in 2012 is that he, Axelrod, and Plouffe refused from the very beginning to bow to the Murdoch golden throne. They certainly paid for their stand-offishness with months/years of "born in Kenya" nonsense and health care "death panels," but today they have their integrity unlike the line-up of pols who've fed at the Murdoch table. Watch them scurry in the coming weeks and try to Lady Macbeth wash off the News International stench.

Even at his advancing age, this man keeps on ticking...how long can he go? But his young son is right there to pick up! His empire is everything that is wrong with this world! Its amazing how many corners of this world he destroyed with his printing presses and tv stations, world may never know.

I can only hope that Congress opens an investigation into all of Murdoch's operations in the U.S. These violations of basic privacy rights are truly frightening, and the American public should have assurances that these totalitarian tactics aren't being used by his "Fair and Balanced" news organizations here.
i read today that Rudy G proclaims Murdoch as an honest and honorable man.  That of course is according to his standards.  They each have the social concience of a fruitfly.

What makes this situation even worse is that Murdoch has been boosting noise-makers like Sarah Palin, who tell us they're "patriotic".  Murdoch and the Koch brothers belong in jail cells next to  each other.

My experience is good possession and skill soccer it probably taught in every good American club team these days ( Not necessary in the high school game) . But, excuse me, I think it is part of the American psyche ( considering football, basketball, and baseball ) that we also love to see for power, strength and speed. I think Pia's advantage is that she coaches a "love" for the game and being a "team" and helps to keep them straight on their skills. Bravo Pia!

This is such an awful tragedy,and the family of the child have my condolences. In society at large, most people will help each other out. And there are always bad apples but I hope that his community and others throughout the world who distrust the outsiders will begin to see each other through their common humanity. This child parents and family are in my prayers!

Let's not get carried away and believe every murderer is mentally ill. Soon that becomes a perception, widely shared in this country that mentally ill = murderer.  Which makes the mentally ill less likely to access care.  As Rosallyn Carter said in her most recent book on the subject, she's been trying to help the mentally ill for forty years, and the stigma continues to increase, as the available treatment and shelter decline.  I'm a psychotherapist now in private practice, who  has worked at community mental health centers and on psychiatric wards, often with schizophrenics.   The former were vastly superior, but community mental health centers are now few and many have closed.  More will close soon as deeper cuts are made to a segment of the population that rarely votes.  People are released to the street.  And end up in jail for peeing in parks or talking to themselves without a cell phone. As for the man in question, it remains to be seen whether he is mentally ill or malingering.  Even if he is, please don't rush to judge all mentally ill as murderers.  Only four percent of the mentally ill are violent.

To those who wonder why Aron was charged with 2nd degree murder:  in NYS murder in the first degree is reserved for special circumstances such as the murder of a police officer or corrections officer; or the victim was a witness to another crime and was murdered to prevent him/her from testifying; or murder in the course of committing a burglary or kidnapping; or prior to the murder the victim was tortured; etc.

To say that a heinous crime was not committed is to say the least. When hearing that little Leiby was found brought it brought me Pain & Sadness. Pain, as a mother, I can only imagine. Sadness, knowing Borough Pk as a diverse ethnic community my first thought was oh God please don't let it be a .......... As a NYer born & raised I have seen
& experienced the ugly face of racism. When the alleged perp was apprehended & found not to be who assumably many thought to be, but in fact one from their own community. Sadly, again I said thank God he wasn't ............
Ben Herb stated that he teaches his children "not to talk to strangers whether they wear a yarmulke or do-rag". As we all can see crime has no color or religion, it is simply a vile act committed against all humanity. A better understanding & coming together in good times & bad be it Jew or Gentile should be an act committed by ALL. Little Leiby RIP.

Although I generally disagree with the everything about self-isolating relgious groups, I get why they would be so specifically upset in this case and I don't think it's because they're racist. To my mind, the community was betrayed by the individual who committed the crime, and by the people who almost certainly knew that individual was disturbed. If he truly was hearing voices, it did not start on Monday. He did not fall mentally ill overnight. Although any community may blame the family and friends of a murderer for not getting help for a mentally ill loved one, the more tightly-knit the community, the more shocking and outrageous the betrayal will seem.

I say this not to imply that families or friends of criminals *should* be blamed for the acts of their associates. Rather, I simply think that natural tendency is more understandable in a case like this. The very insular, self-policing type of group depends heavily on trusting each member to act for the good of all members in accordance with a certain code. A violation of that trust calls into question the validity of the isolation, which they take completely for granted. It's not about being racist or thinking they're superior, it's about thinking they knew something for sure and being shown that they were wrong. Being that wrong can be pretty hard to swallow for doctrinaire religious zealots.

Those of us who live in the real world understand that we cannot assume anything about members of a community based on a particular shared trait. These people don't live in the real world. It's not about them assuming bad things about outsiders, it's about them assuming good things about themselves.

So there's been no accounting for a country defaulting in these "test" results. So who is going to be uplifted by the results? No one. It has been a meaningless charade taken by officials without any real plan to avert the downfall of the European Union. Just another stall for time, to think of another plan to stall for time, when no real solution is coming. Watch out folks here comes another crack in our World's financial structure dreamed up by ingeniously short sighted engineering goals. The balloon is collapsing and there is nothing to do but get out of the way.
